notes.text: sap.suite.ui.microchart: Fix micro charts alignment in Safari
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Fix position of "No data" text in IE
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChartSegment: No Focus on all four sides for Legends within chart.
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Information about control added Aria-label
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart: Zero label handling
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChartRenderer : set the empty div element as unfocusable so that focus does not get trapped inside header container.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart: Value not visible in sap_belize_hcw theme and Focus issue
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart : Fixed the qunits which were getting failed because of browser dependencies.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.BulletMicroChart: Rework Bullet Microchart to comply with the specification

sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveBarChart : Not rendering in compact density mode so added check on after rendering of control to see class "sapUiSizeCompact" is applied and render accordingly also interactiveness of bars are maintained correctly.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.StackedBarMicroChart: Rework StackedBarMicrochart to comply with the specification and add a smart variant for this control
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Update MicroChart explored samples
Revert sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChartSegment: Unit of Value missing in InteractiveDonutChart."
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisionMicroChartRenderer: No space between negetive value and Unit of Value.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChartSegment: Unit of Value missing in InteractiveDonutChart.
sap.suite.ui.microchart.themes.sap_belize_hcw.InteractiveBarChart.less:Value outside Bar not visible in HCW theme
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: When the whole line and label does not fit the available container space, hide it
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Add responsive view to ComparisonMicroChartViewType
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Change height of items proportionally based on current chart width
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicroChart: Changed max-width of value label
sap.suite.ui.microchart.ComparisonMicrochart: Hide ComparisonChartData items correctly when container height is small
sap.suite.ui.microchart.DeltaMicroChart: Width property not taken into account
sap.suite.ui.microchart: Issue with size property changing to auto fixed
sap.suite.ui.microchart.InteractiveDonutChart : Interactiveness of donut chart is lost when rendered in compact density mode.
